values:
LAPTOP!
 

See, heres the thing. My father works as a computer technician.. so used laptops that nobody wants are easy for him to grab. I've gone through 3 of those laptops in 2 years. Two of which were ancient. the good one, well, the system board broke and they are super expensive to replace so I was like fuuck it and never bothered replacing it. i finally have a NEW decent laptop which will hopefully be good for a few years and not just a few months : )

So, I actually havent had much contact with any computers in the last couple of months..when usually I would be signed in on msn or searching the web looking at random crap. It was actually a nice break being away from it all.. and my girlfriend can just as easily talk on blackberry messenger to me anyways and regardless of that I had become pretty bored of Facebook and Youtube and MSN...actually..practically everything that has to do with the computer. I've got a tan now. All because I wasn't stuck on the computer.

 

Get out there people. Its a beautiful world we live in. Don't let technology take over your life.

later LJ.

this is pretty fucked up. walk at 11? suure.

I'm confused as to why this feeling of dread and confusion has washed over me.

I want to cry. I feel stuck. Theres nothing that I can do.

 

Even if I didn't love her as much as she loves me..even if we left one another because of distance...

 

there would be no use. I'm too blind, too stupid. or i was. now i dont even know what i am.

a 3,000 mile distance is a big one. I promised her I would love her forever.. we promised eachother that.

 

I want to rewind and go back to when I couldve had a shot at a normal life. When things weren't so hard for me. Thats impossible now. 

I never want to drink again. Not if everytime I'm going to make an ass of myself. I feel rundown, and now that i'm home from work and i'm thinking of this last week, I dont know where to place things. it wasnt the situation when it was there that made things off.. it's the consequences of whats going on now.

 

i told you how i felt. maybe thats a big mistake that i cant take back anymore. its not just some secret like it used to be. I can tell when you look at me. vice versa.

 

But i love HER. I Left everyone ive ever been with to be with her. I wish I could understand too, but I dont.

I dont think I'll ever really understand.

this old lj of mine has gone through a major but subtle reconstruction

I took out all of the things that weren't the greatest to look back on...

this had been on a year of hiatus.

I have a google blog but I haven't even posted on that for almost a year now aswell.

 

things are going alright for me. My girlfriend is going to montreal with me in august, and then coming to halifax for a couple weeks. I'm very excited.

my mind is doing flips right now. It's just really hard to explain..

hmm. I cant spit the right words out.

No sleep again last night.
Sheesh, I really need to fix my sleeping pattern.
I tried,and tried,and tried some more. I literally layed there for hours. NOTHING.
Oh well, I suppose its nice to be up before 7.
Beautiful sunrise, birds coming out to greet the new day, snow glistening with the first appearance of the days sunlight.
I suppose I can survive off of a little coffee boost for a bit, until I inevitably fall asleep on the couch later.
The only thing that ruins that image of said above is our half-broken fence from all of the storms we've gotten this past winter. And our half dead tree that was pulvarized by the storms as well.
I'm guessing that I'll be helping alot with the renovations. The list is ever-growing.

Spring is the absolute best time of year. No more snow, no more sad trees with no leaves to blow around, no more gross brown grass. Sadly, our spring hasn't quite come yet. It's pretty odd, usually by this time we dont get any more snow storms. I suppose that weather is always changing, its truly unpredictable.

My aunt Nanette called last night, with a friendly invite to her place and also bad news. My aunt Phyllis is in the hospital, and all I know so far is she is Anemic and she had to get a blood transfusion. She has lost over 40 pounds, and she wasnt a huge lady to start with. This weekend I plan on going to see her. My mother though, I'm not so sure will even bother. She's got this weird thing that she wont visit someone in the hospital. Last person she ever visited was my grandfather..about 5 years ago. I think part of it had to do with him losing his memory, and not remembering mom everytime she went in to visit.

Word also got through my family that I am going through some tough times and that I quit my job. Wow, word travels fast in the family! ( my aunt Karen called last week and asked how I was.. I'm guessing thats how the grapevine started.)
Even so, I'm glad that they are concerned. I told Nanette not too worry, that things are slowly coming together for me. Even though I felt like what I was saying was somewhat decieving, I truly am trying my best. School is my No.1 concern right now.

That's all for now!

just got a new laptop yesterday, its pretty sweet, it runs better than my older one did for sure. its really fast and doesn't take a million years just to get online. 

i dont have much to say, its just been a few weeks since i posted anything.
10 days until i go away! im kinda freaking out, never travelled alone, but im sure it'll be fine.


i'll post when i have more things to say and am less tired and more creative feeling.

im going. June 12th- 16th. its the most random place i know, but theirs reasons.

and its another life experience.

i love to travel. i'll be broke,but thats ok.

=]. thats all.

i have peeling shoulders. and my nose. AND my chest.
but it was TOTALLY worth it.

everyday was about 30 degrees.
i felt like a sloth the whole time. if i overexerted myself (AKA walked faster than snail pace) i would start to sweat, it was that hot!

we went on an excursion on monday, which was about an hour or so drive away from our resort.
their palm trees everywhere you look, and beautiful mountains.

by the way, the people there drive like MANIACS!!!!
alot of them have these little motorcycles that you dont even need a lisence for. its pretty awesome but i found alot of them like to cut people off. which was totally scary because our driver wasnt driving "safe". he was driving like a maniac.
if you think people here in canada drive nuts.. your wrong. go to the dominican republic and youll see what i mean!

so.. pretty much everyday, everyone was drunk. it was funny.
ill put pics at the end of this post, just a couple.

..my cousin and i won the beer drinking competition..is that bad?

so..i didnt sleep at all last night, cause im way too excited.
i still have some packing to do. nothing major though.

i tried to have a nice warm bath, but i got in and it was COLD. so now im really awake. argh lol.

im already kinda tanned but by the time i get back im probably gonna be super duper tanned.

i got till about.. 5 pm till i leave the house, so i got a while to make sure i got everything.. i made a freaking list of the things i THINK i need.

i was gonna bring my laptop but that would suck if it broke =[.

im just wondering, what the hell am i gonna charge my ipod with? mehh.

so im bringing my PSP, my IPOD, Cell phone ( although i dont think itll work once we leave NS) but jamie told me to bring it just incase. *shrugs* and my digital camera and its charger.

i hope meds are ok to bring on a plane, cause if i dont have them, then ill get sick again? haha.

so i made this huge-ass list and its all pretty much packed except like, my toothbrush lol.

*shivers* stupid friggin cold water.

uhmm yeah so this was TOTALLY random but.. i dunno. 
peace.
you need to sleep more. and not think about stuff so much, srsly.

explaining this.

what is their to explain? really though.

simple as this.

Missy is gone.

Im still sick.
Grampie is gone.

..how much worse can this year get?


they told us that missy had 1 to 3 years to live. she had lieukemia.

her body started shutting down on her just a week after finding out.

so when i wasnt home, she was put down.

i know alot of people could care less that a dog died... but shes been around since i was 7.

shes like my little sis. and i miss her. and the house is weird without her.

ive been avoiding coming home since thursday.

theirs a big void in my life now and theirs no way that it will ever be filled. i dont feel like ill ever be complete.

i just want to curl up and die right now.


well... thats all.      fuck you 2008.

PLEASE everything work out. i hope you stay together. me and like a zillion other people.

=[

so im really sick,
again.

this hasnt happened since i was diagnosed at 13.

my first flare up.

i feel hoooorrible.

supposedly its stress related but i dunno. nobody really knows what causes flare ups.

its weird about grampie.. i didnt react the same way i did with my other grandparents.
i reacted really differently. like it was totally okay. yeah i cried, and i was there for him before he slipped away, but i think its because i was in the hospital the night before he died that i felt okay at the funeral and wake. their were lots of tears shed, by plenty of family members, but he was 94. he lived an amazing life and was an amazing person, even though he was always super quiet.


so uh.. thats all right now i guess. except my colitis is flaring up and has been for the last 3 weeks. and i have to see my specialist. but i'll spare the details. i dont like talking about sad things, it makes me feel all emoish, so hopefully the next entry will be a happy one? who knows.

im glad i seen Grampie yesterday, because theirs no chance ever again of seeing him.
i hope hes in a better place.












 
And as he took his last breath of air,


i hope all he was thinking of was peace.
april 23rd-1st!!  IM SO FUCKING EXCITED. and theirs no way i can or will back out. this wont be my only vacation out of canada, for sure.

well.. suposedly lol.
i think i'll always have that teenager inside.
i dont feel like an adult. its just feels like another day to me.
so, happy birthday to mee!! and happy birthday bekka, for tomorrow!

pce!

well .. mostly just new clothes lol.
3 new shirts, new jeans, new shoes, and few little things

it was a really fun day, me and katie had a blast, and afterwards we went to steak and stein, which was delicious. im still soo full lol

i think i have to return the pants though,.cause they dont fit right.

the mall was pretty crazy but not as crazy as the 27th was, fuck i was so claustrophobic in there haha. i actually got lots of shopping done that i needed to do today.

we seen danielle when we first got there, it was nice seeing her even though we only said hi for like a secound, i havent seen her in so long lol.
my shoes are shaweet, their slip on's and theyve got like skulls and guitars and stuff on them.

i was gonna pick up the instruments for rockband but everywhere i go they either have a long ass line up or their sold out. it'll be days, weeks, probably months till i can get them.

well, today was fuunn. and now imma go drink. cause its saturday and thats how i roll lmao.=]
have a good night! or day!
this time of year, all i think about is you..

plenty of beer here. will be good times.

=}

ss.dd.
(same shit. different day.)

im real glad that i tried.  again. 
im worried about whats to come next.

and im fucking sick and tired of being this alone.
its sad that i always feel so tired, and go to bed around 7 most nights.

im sick to my stomach. i hate myself.
i just want all of the bad air to go away.

ive been waiting for so long to find someone. i feel like all my life consists of is worried thoughts.
i feel as if im drowning in a worry pool. thats what i'll call it.
the worry pool makes me think of my past, and my future, both at the same time.
i think of where ive travelled, where i'll travel to next, who i'll be with next, how much ill get payed...
the worry pool consists of my every thought, and every word that i speak.
i see some people, and their so happy.
i wonder what ever happened to my happiness. i wonder if it will ever come back.
i have my moments of happiness, especially around friends.
but when im alone, all i can think of is bad things. bad memories, how much of pricks some old friends have become...
im afraid of my own well-being. im tired of fighting myself for some peace in my life.

my pathetic, useless life.

the worry pool is turning into a whirlpool, as i slowly lose my sanity.
around and around i spin, JUST holding on to who i think i am.
i think i am a good person, but i really dont know.

nobody really appreciates things anymore it seems, whether its an offering of a friendship or a date to the movies.
nobody gives a shit anymore, so why bother trying?
im not here to impress anyone, obviously.
i just want to know why friendship isnt as important as anything else in this world.
too many people get used for their things, or used for a fuck.

and people who are together these days worry too much of where their partner is, if their off fucking someone else. or if their partner is going to break up with them soon.

what happened to love?

maybe most us mistake love with lust.
or just plain hornyness.


i realize ive gotten off the subject, which is why i'll end this here...
is their any REAL point to life?

i feel overly confident today.
i feel like i could take on the world.
it just is.

Its either others are fucked in the head, or i am.
im considering it being other people though. since i dont do anything out of the ordinary to be fucked in the head.
my job blows. i want to walk out the door everyday i work there.
i think im gonna call alex, cause i miss him.

k. bye.

yeah...fuck off.

your not a fucking friend. i lost your number, so i cant call, and i wouldnt call anyways.
but you know mine, i know you do. gave u my cell,too.
you just dont try anymore. and i cant believe ive been sitting around this whole time trying to be your friend, when you dont even give a shit. you have your girlfriend, and i have my job and a few friends up the street. so be it. just dont try anymore. and once you see this i hope you dont get mad at me. you can get mad at yourself, but i dunno.
yeah, its so sad that i have nobody, right?
i have so much pent up anger right now, i just want to beat the shit out of something. something, that wont hit me back, i just want to hit it over and over again,maybe a punching bag, lol.

some of your entries long ago just made sense now.
you had to pick, and find a reason, you had to have your friends find a way to make you hate me..
i dont give a shit if they still hate me.

but you have to understand, friends talk. they fucking TALK TO EACHOTHER.
and you called my cell while i was in the car with my parents and you were all " oh theirs nothing i can do, blahblahblah"

and then, i havent heard from you since.
and that day i was ditched, i just remembered about that..

at least when i get something or someone in my mind, i still try to have a relative life. yeah its not working right now, but maybe things will level out for me. im hoping they do.

its just really fucked up that shes my friend too. and she doesnt wanna hang out with me.

so this is to you for all the fucked up entries that were directed at me that really made no sense.

fuck it all. i just wanted to be friends.

and if theis seems to make me small to you, i dont know what to say to that. im just speaking my mind, that this is really messed up.
i really dont know anymore.

it kind of reminds me of some city&colour songs, because mostly of the guitar that goes along with it.
100% mine.

your all i see
and what i had
is just a memory
you see me here
but you dont see me
you've left the past
no longer believe in me
no longer believe,no

i catch my breath, and close my eyes
memories of who i used to be, they hypnotize
i clear the tears,that run down my face
its been months now, still cant find my place
and i just dont know

how much longer i can hold up
no i just dont know
how im supposed to go on,
im just struggling along.
im just struggling along

i see you now and i dont know
how we made it for so long
at the same time i see the me i used to be
and i wonder why now im not strong
i cant get along
i cant think of anything else but who i used to be
im not me, i cant see what i once had, anymore

i cant see me anymore.

choosing not to fight.
if it takes my whole life
i wont break i wont bend
it will all be worth it
it will be worth it in the end.

when the stars all burn out

Just look at me

Cause you just don't know
You just don't know 
All I am is me
All I am is me
All I am is me

we had the best years of our lives,
but you and i will never be the same.
september took me by surprise
and i was left to watch the seasons change.
its been so quiet since youve gone
and every day  seems like a year
sometimes i wish i could move on
but all the memories would disappear
so many things i shouldve said when i had the chance.
so many times we took it all for granted.
i never thought this could ever end
never thought id lose my best friend
everything is different now, can we stop the world from turning?
i never thought id have to let you go, never thought id feel this low.
i wish i could go back, and we'd stop the world from turning.

when we were young, we thought we knew so much
and now it seems so far away
im wondering if i was good enough.
so many things i shouldve said when i had the chance.
so many times we took it all for granted

everything is different now, can we stop the world from turning?

i never thought id feel this low
i wish i could go back
and we'd stop the world from turning

everything is different now.
i never thought id feel this low.
can we stop this world from turning?

ever feel like you have almost no life, except work?
guhh.

ever so lonely.
i wanna look for someone, but i dont.

im so scared to look. im sick of people being assholes.
i am awful at showing someone i like them, and i used to be sooo good at it. but then again, im busy hiding myself from my parents. and i had to work with mom this week.
she keeps going on about "finding a guy."
no,mom. no. a girl. i need to find a girl. =[
sometimes i just want to fucking die.
im a fucking flamer. ahah. or so it seems.
guys are dicksss.

im exhausted with my life.

everyone just fuck off.

i feel really empty.
i dont know what im going to do with my life.
i dont know if i'll ever find someone. all i want, is someone.
someone who cares. who isnt always looking for an argument.
who isnt shallow
i dont even fucking know anymore.
why do all of my dreams always come crashing down?

wow.
i never thought this day would come so fast.


leaving my last exam, i had so many different feelings, it was almost unbearable.
i had fear, happiness,sadness,scared and full of anxiety, all wrapped into one complete feeling.

all thats left of high school for me now is prom,graduation,and going to pick up my report card. then thats it for me.

im sick of him. im sick of the shit i have to put up with.
i havent seen him out of school for more than 15 minutes in a month.
he ignores me. he doesnt care.
maybe after being each others prom date, nothing more will come out of it.
maybe this is why i hate dating guys so much, and i steered clear of them for 3 years.
im sick of your fucking bullshit. intead of getting stoned and partying every weekend, maybe you could try and fucking pay attention to me. i care. i did care more a few weeks ago. my feelings are slowly deteriorating for you.
its so nice of you to come to eastern passage and not even call on me, but call on somebody else. AFTER no bothering for a month.
what the hell is wrong with you?
you are so self-centered. why did you even bother with me in the first place if your not gonna bother with me now.
am i that awful, that i dont deserve love, and affection?


fuck highschool. fuck you.
i just want someone to love, and to love me in return. i didnt think it would be so hard to find again.

its weird how fast high school has gone by. my last exam is tomorrow. prom is monday.grad is wednesday. and, thats it....i'll be done.







thats crazy.

i wish i had seen past all of the idiotic things to start with.
you are one amazing person.
and a true friend.
thank you so much, for being here for me.

being sick really stinks.
feels like someones pushing on both sides of my head as hard as they can.
blaaah
i dont think ill be able to get a grad t-shirt. cause im broke. 
im in the yearbook!
but i never bought one. so i miss out on that, too.


wohoo for being poor!not.
thankfully i wont be for long, though.
yesterday was cool. although i only went to one full class, lol. sa'll good! =]
anyways im gonna jet, got stuff to do
tataa!

right now, i hate my life.
i hate where im at.
i hate everything thats going wrong in my life.

fuck this. i cant take this much longer.

alright, that brought me to tears.

its nice to know that you care.
thank you so much.

i will try, if you try to.
im sorry for everything. im serious.

i feel so fucking empty right now, i wish someone would notice.
i need hugs.

this shit ive been putting up with the past couple weeks is unbearable.
i feel like screaming for somebody, but when i want to, i dont know who to scream for.
its as if nobody cares.

again,thanks.
im just as hateful as you..

it was amazing.
i was sitting out on alexs deck with his father stephen, and we seen a fireball go by.
its the first one ive seen in my entire life.
it made me think about the things we take for granted.
this world we live on is so beautiful, it and its surroundings,
yet people are more than happy to ruin it with pollution.
get off your lazy asses so we dont all die.
kthnks!

Being Tall doesnt make you more beautiful.
Being really skinny makes you no more wonderful than another person.
Loving someone, and getting love in return seem to be two opposite things.
Gay, Bi, Straight, none of that should matter,
throw your labels out the window.
theirs no use for them here.
someday i will own a house that will welcome any color, and sexuality, any religion.
respect will go all around.
i will show my love for the world. i wont litter.I will take long walks, or bike rides, go to the ocean and think. i will talk to myself and nobody else.I will wait for an answer...even though their isnt one now, maybe someday my concience will answer all of my life questions..
will any one see me? will everyone stop expecting me to be perfect, and ALWAYS giving? will i ever get anything back in return? love? another love? a rekindling with a current partner? this new one, to realize how i feel?
will i get in a fight with girlfriends and boyfriends ive had in the past?
can i make peace with every single person i've harmed in my life..?
will i stop being so expecting of friendships,perfect relationships, perfect lovers..
no fights?
im sick of being this person who will only look at the dark side of things.
i lose people because i stick it in my mind. I dont stop thinking about it until its already happened. i obsess and obsess..and that person ive never wished to become, i will.
if you say "don't" "won't" "shouldn't".. all the negatives to yourself, i believe you will have a craving, or an unknown excuse to become that.
love is the most wonderful feeling in the world. and with love comes happiness. and with love comes feeling complete. and with love, you will feel comfortable
and
with love..you see yourself anxious
with love.. you feel full
with,,love.. you feel obsessed.you feel worried. you cant get them out of your head!
and, with broken hearts, which comes after love, you feel dead inside
you find it impossible to find someone as good as what you thought you had
you find yourself being torn into peices. it takes forever to get on your feet again.
maybe love isnt the most wonderful feeling in the world.
but thats life. right?
maybe.
to conclude,
 i will most of all respect myself.because i feel that i dont see myself anymore. even my own reflection seems to be someone else.
but until then, i will keep my thoughts in my mind, and written on this lj.
although its not as private as  sometimes wish it was...
thats alright. a couple of people can see my thoughts. its not the end of the world.

Im definatly depressed.

yayy

ahah usually i wouldnt do this, but to fight with me over LJ?! wow. grow up!

going out.
peace.
